attributes.action: No to cuts #Lincoln south fire station
attributes.background: In response to the Lincolnshire Fire & Rescue Integrated Risk Management Plan consultation: • we say NO to Lincoln South Fire Station switching to Day Crewed meaning increased response times.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Lincolnshire County Council and Lincolnshire Fire and Rescue.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:
http://www.lincolnshire.gov.uk/local-democracy/finding-your-views/e-petitions/
